## CardContainer.(constructor)

Base class for general card containers, like decks and hands.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(CardType: {
        new (...args: any[]): TCard;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  CardType | { new (...args: any\[\]): TCard; } | Constructor for the type of card stored in this container. Used to find the card dimensions. |
